headline: LOWE'S COMPANIES, INC. DECLARES CASH DIVIDEND
summary: The board of directors of Lowe's Companies, Inc. (NYSE: LOW) has declared a quarterly cash dividend of one dollar and 15 cents ($1.15) per share, payable May 7, 2025, to shareholders of record as of April 23, 2025.
